about_the_game: Composed by Arnaud Roy (a.k.a Flybyno), the Endless Space OST Includes 27 tracks in lossless .wav format. ""Music is the exact audio equivalent of admiring the beauty, fragility and variety of the colourful spheres scattered through the celestial void"" - Rock Paper Shotgun, June 2012
detailed_description: Composed by Arnaud Roy (a.k.a Flybyno), the Endless Space OST Includes 27 tracks in lossless .wav format. ""Music is the exact audio equivalent of admiring the beauty, fragility and variety of the colourful spheres scattered through the celestial void"" - Rock Paper Shotgun, June 2012
